Description: Tailwind JIT compiler cannot scan interpolated strings.
Blindly increasing z-index without regarding stacking context.
Incorrect_Pattern: z- on child of transformed parent
Correct_Pattern: Use Portals or remove transform from parent

Description: Data fetching in useEffect without cleanup/abort.
Severity: useEffect(() => { const ab = new AbortController();... return () => ab.abort(); }, [url])

Description: Div with onClick missing semantic roles.
Hallucinating utilities that don't exist in config.
Applying overflow to multiple nested containers.
Incorrect_Pattern: html { overflow-y: scroll } body { overflow-y: scroll }
Correct_Pattern: Apply overflow only to the root scroller

Description: Binding state to every keystroke on large forms.
Correct_Pattern: Use react-hook-form or useRef for uncontrolled inputs

Description: Using opacity on text backgrounds without checking image contrast.
Missing underscore for spaces in calc().
Omitting variables used in useEffect from dependency array.

Correct_Pattern: Use styled span or adjust hierarchy

Description: Using vh units for full height on mobile.
